text: Do you track your expenses weekly?
tooltip: Tracking: Recording all money spent daily.
Budgeting: Planning how to spend your money.

text: Do you save a portion of your income monthly?
tooltip: Saving: Setting aside money for future use.

text: Do you often spend on non-essentials like entertainment?
tooltip: Non-essentials: Items or activities not critical to daily needs.

text: Do you plan your purchases in advance?
tooltip: Planning: Deciding what to buy before spending.
Saving frequency: How regularly you set aside money.

text: How often do you overspend at the market?
How often do you review your finances?
tooltip: Reviewing: Checking your income and expenses.

text: How often do you buy on impulse?
How often do you join savings groups?
tooltip: Savings groups: Local groups for collective saving.
